value: View of some of Schinoussa's hilly terrain and the sea beyond

. Its population, not including visitors, is 206.

value: Schinoussa is a small island south of Naxos, between Koufonissia and Heraklia. It has smooth hills and valleys and fertile land. Its climate is mild and predictable.

Mersini (the port), Chora or Panagia (1200m from the port, built on a small hill at the time of the pirates’ invasions and has a great panoramic view) and Messaria.
. Stone built bungalows with swimming pool and a sea view. It is on the south side of Schinoussa in front of the  popular beach, Tsigouri, and 600m from the village.

value: Surrounding islands: Ofidoussa or Fidou (only a few metres from Schinoussa), Argilos on the South and Aspronisi on the southeast.
